review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick works perfectly for streaming movies and TV shows on my TV.  Installation of the Stick was quick and simple.  The interface for searching for movies and shows to watch is very easy to use and the remote works well.  I also use my Fire Phone and Fire TV APP as a remote, and it is a little easier than the remote that is included with the Fire Stick.  The TV that I have the Fire Stick installed on is on the opposite side of the apartment as the wireless router, and I have had no issues with buffering or connecting to the internet.  Overall I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone that uses streaming services, especially Amazon Prime.
